Articles.Content:
Well, I need to check the temperature somehow.

The user below me has played, but not beaten Zelda II yet.

Nope.

The user below me likes Simcity 4.

What the hell?

The user below me understands Italian.

Nuh-uh.

The user below me prefers PC over Mac (Linux still wins, but isn't included )

Are you kidding me? Linux is so overrated!

The user below me own a Commodore 64.

Yes, a C64 was the second home computer I ever owned. LOAD "*",8,1

The user below me has typed in a program from a computer magazine like Byte.

nope, I write my own programs...

The person below me knows python...

Ish.

The user below me lives in Puerto Rico.

Nope!

The user below me has nothing better to do.

As ashamed as I am in admitting it, it's true.

The user below me has never done a return mission from the Jool system!

Do you not see the badge?

The user below me owns a pair of scissors, but has never actually cut anything with them.

Yep.

The User below me has gone to Eve and Back in KSP

Orbit and back? Yes. Land and back? Noooooo.

User below found an old game CD recently and is playing it.

Not necessarily found, because I knew where it was, but I recently started playing Empires: Dawn of the Modern World again!

The user below me owns an N64.

Yesh! And San Fransisco Rush 2049 and Perfect Dark, the good old days.

The user below me is learning to animate.

Yyyyyyeah u could say that

The user below me hasn't been to space.

true (except in KSP)

The user below me loves aviation

I do love flying in KSP, that's for sure! Though my real passion is Astronautics :3

The user below me has never owned an Apple device.

Nope. At my house there is a Macbook and iPod, though I use neither.

The user below me likes dolphins.

Sure, they're cool.

The user below me IS a dolphin!

I am NOT!

The person below me works for Interstellar Innovations.

Nope

The person below me went to Eeloo

I wish

The user below me enjoys pie more than cake

Nope.

I hate pie.

The user below me is a Na'vi.

Liquid Na only'

The user below me sometime have to chat of a things or two.
